nodes.text: Reubens Robotic Systems was a droid manufacturing company who, along with Industrial Automaton, designed the RX-Series pilot droid to bridge the gap between astromech and protocol droids.

Reubens Robotic Systems was a fanon invention playing on the name of RX-24's voice actor, Paul Reubens. It became canon within the Star Wars Legends continuity when it was mentioned in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, a three-volume reference book edited by Bob Vitas and released on December 9, 2008.
